short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject some fun into your browsing experience with AdSyringe and turn comments into a comedic masterpiece.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdSyringe is a humorous Chrome extension that "injects" ads into comment sections with a playful twist. Perfect for those who enjoy a good laugh, AdSyringe adds a touch of satire to online discussions by cleverly placing mock ads within user comments. Whether you're looking to prank your friends or just have some fun while browsing, AdSyringe delivers a dose of entertainment straight to your comment threads.
